name: aaronbassett-marketplace
description: Personal marketplace for Claude Code plugins, agents, and skills

plugins.name: dev-specialisms
plugins.description: Niche developer skills for deployment, CI/CD, AI/LLM integration, and DevX tooling

plugins.name: devs
plugins.description: Core language and framework skills for Python, Rust, TypeScript, React, and security

plugins.name: flutter-core
plugins.description: Comprehensive Flutter and Dart development toolkit providing expert guidance on UI/UX, architecture, state management, testing, performance, deployment, and backend integration with ServerPod

plugins.name: git-lovely
plugins.description: Everything you need for lovely Git workflows including GitHub CLI integration and conventional commits

plugins.name: settings-presets
plugins.description: Configuration toolkit for streamlining Claude Code project setup with powerline status line and attribution settings

plugins.name: spec-writer
plugins.description: Guide users through creating complete, unambiguous feature specifications using a discovery-driven process.

plugins.name: sandbox
plugins.description: Create isolated Docker-based development environments for running Claude Code safely

plugins.name: constitution
plugins.description: Create, validate, and enforce project constitutions with living governance

plugins.name: readme-and-co
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive GitHub repository documentation including README, LICENSE, CONTRIBUTING, SECURITY, and GitHub templates following best practices
